extendedInfo.description: If you are 50 Cent's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check 50 Cent's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all 50 Cent's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of 50 Cent's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Power of the Dollar- 50 Cent Is The Future- Guess Who's Back?- No Mercy, No Fear- Get Rich or Die Tryin'- The New Breed- The Massacre- Curtis- Before I Self Destruct- 5 (Murder By Numbers)- Street King Immortal-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - 21 Questions- 50 Bars- 8 Mile Road (G-Unit Remix)- A Baltimore Love Thing- A Little Bit Of Everything U.T.P.-
